Name: Claim Issue Pending
Description: Holding state whilst payment is taken

Name: Awaiting Claim Details Notification
Description: The Claimant has created a claim and now needs to notify the defendant of the claim and claim details

Name: Awaiting Defendant Response
Description: The claimant has notified the defendant of the claim and claim details. The Defendant has to provide their response to the claim

Name: Claimant Intent Pending
Description: The defendant has submitted their response to the claim and the claim is now awaiting the claimants intention

Name: Case Proceeds Offline
Description: Claim is not able to be progressed online in CCD and will be taken offline
